tasks.task: Track water intake daily for 7 days
tasks.requirement: screenshot of a water tracking app showing daily intake for the week

tasks.task: Complete a 30-minute walk or light cardio session for 5 days
tasks.requirement: screenshot from a fitness tracking app (e.g., Strava, Google Fit) showing 5 completed sessions of 30+ minutes activity

tasks.task: Track food intake for 3 days using a nutrition tracking app
tasks.requirement: screenshot of the summary page from a nutrition tracking app (e.g., MyFitnessPal) showing 3 days of tracked meals

tasks.task: Perform 3 structured bodyweight workouts (e.g., squats, push-ups, planks)
tasks.requirement: three distinct screenshots from a workout app or timer showing completion of each workout

tasks.task: Ensure at least one fruit and one vegetable are part of your main meals for 5 days
tasks.requirement: a collage of photos (one per meal) demonstrating the presence of fruit and vegetables in 15 different main meals over 5 days

tasks.task: Get 7-8 hours of sleep for 5 nights
tasks.requirement: screenshot from a sleep tracking app (e.g., Sleep Cycle, Apple Health) showing 5 nights with 7-8 hours of sleep duration

tasks.task: Complete 3 sessions of 20-minute continuous cardio (e.g., jogging, cycling, swimming)
tasks.requirement: screenshot from a fitness tracking app showing 3 completed sessions of 20+ minutes of continuous cardio

tasks.task: Prepare 4 healthy home-cooked meals this week
tasks.requirement: four distinct photos of the prepared healthy meals before consumption

tasks.task: Engage in 15 minutes of stretching or yoga daily for 4 days
tasks.requirement: four distinct photos of yourself in a stretching or yoga pose, taken on different days

tasks.task: Complete 4 sessions of 45-minute moderate intensity exercise (e.g., brisk walking, hiking, gym workout)
tasks.requirement: screenshot from a fitness tracking app showing 4 completed sessions of 45+ minutes of moderate intensity exercise

tasks.task: Plan and prepare healthy meals for 3 full days in advance
tasks.requirement: a photo of your meal prep containers or ingredients laid out for 3 days, along with a text description of the planned meals for each day

tasks.task: Write a reflection on your progress and outline 2 future health goals
tasks.requirement: a text document (e.g., screenshot of a note app) containing a paragraph reflecting on your journey and a bulleted list of 2 specific, measurable future health goals
